County Clare is lighting up today with solid surf at 9 ft @10s WSW and fresh 17 mph SSW winds. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering good windows throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 5 ft @17s with lighter 14 mph SSE winds, still providing fun conditions at various breaks. Day after, conditions worsen with 7 ft @14s W but fresh 24 mph W winds will make it blown out. Best: today.
